st: Setšoantšo se ne se nkiloe ka kichineng, e le hore a ka fumana pono eohle. Kaha e ne e le studio, e ne e e-na le monyako o moholo oa khalase e thellang, 'me ntho eohle e tletse ho itšeha, monna ea litelu a apereng joalo ka morena, a tšoere plunger holim'a ntloana e koetsoeng.

en: I zoomed around the photo at the rest of the room. His bed was made with a beige duvet. A neat desk with an elaborate computer set up on it. Three large screens and a keypad and wireless mouse in the middle. There was a tiny dog bed next to the desk and a potted plant in the corner. Artwork on the walls. It was a nice apartment—minus the view. He was obviously clean and had good enough taste.

st: Ke ile ka lula ka kamoreng e setseng ea ho hlapela. Bethe ea hae e ne e entsoe ka beige duvet. Sesebelisoa se nang le komporo e nang le eona. Li-skrini tse tharo tse kholo le konopo ea keypad le mouse e se nang mohala bohareng. Ho ne ho e-na le bethe e nyane ea ntja haufi le tafole le semela se nang le metsi sebakeng sa polokelo. Mesebetsi ea matsoho marakong. E ne e le kamore e ntle haholo, e seng ea bohlokoa haholo. Ho hlakile hore o ne a hloekile 'me o ne a e-na le tatso e lekaneng.
yo: Mo ṣe àwòrán yíká níbi ìyókù yàrá náà. Wọ́n ṣe Ibùsùn rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú aṣọ ìbùsùn aláwọ̀ béjì. Tábìlì tó mọ́ tónítóní pẹ̀lú ẹ̀rọ kọ̀m̀pútà tí ó dára tí wọ́n gbé kalẹ̀ lórí rẹ̀. Awọn iboju nla mẹta ati bọtini bọtini kan ati asin alailowaya ni aarin. Ibùsùn ajá kékeré kan wà lẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ tábìlì àti ilé-iṣẹ́ ìkòkò ní igun. Iṣẹ́ ọnà lórí ògiri. Ilé tí ó dára ni - minus the view. Ó hàn gbangba pé ó mọ́ ó sì ní ìtọ́wò tó dára tó.
tn: 'Ke ne ka dikologa setshwantshô se se mo kamoreng' - I am around the picture at the rest of the room 'Bolao jwa gagwê bo ne bo dirilwe ka leswê' - His bed was made with a beige duvet O ne a na le khompiutara e e nang le khomphiutha e e nang le khomphiutha e e neng e e tlhomile mo go yone. Di-screen tse tharo tse kgolo le selotlolo sa keypad le se se nang megala mo gare ga bogare. Go ne go na le bolao jo bonnye jo bo gaufi le ntlo le semela se se neng se na le metsi mo sekhutlwaneng. Art kwa Walls E ne e le lefelo le lentle le lentle le le neng le na le pono e e neng e le teng. Go bonala a ne a le phepa e bile a na le tatso e e lekaneng.
ty: Ua haati au i te hoho'a i te toe'a o te piha. Ua hamanihia to ' na ro'i e te hoê tao'a parauhia beige. Te hoê iri papairaa mâ e te hoê matini roro uira faahiahia mau i tuuhia i nia iho. E toru paruai rarahi e te hoê pata hoho'a taviri e te hoê niuniu aita e niuniu i ropu. Te vai ra te hoê ro'i uri na'ina'i i piha'i iho i te iri papa'iraa e te hoê tumu raau i roto i te poro. Te mau hoho'a i ni'a i te mau papa'i. E fare nehenehe mau—aita e nehenehe e mata'ita'i i te hoho'a. E mea mâ oia e e mea ite roa oia i te tamata.
mai: हम बाकी कमरा मे फोटो के जूम केलहुं। हुनकर बिस्तर बेज डुवेट सं बनल छल। एकटा साफ-सुथरा डेस्क जाहि पर एकटा विस्तृत कम्प्यूटर सेट अछि। तीनटा पैघ स्क्रीन आ बीचमे एकटा कीपैड आ वायरलेस माउस। डेस्कक बगलमे एकटा छोट कुकुरक बिछौना आ कोनमे एकटा बर्तन बला पौधा छल। दीवार पर कलाकृति। ई एकटा बढ़िया अपार्टमेंट छल - दृश्य के घटाउ। ओ स्पष्ट रूपसँ साफ छलाह आ पर्याप्त स्वाद रखैत छलाह।
mg: Nanodidina ny sary teo amin'ny ambin'ny efitrano aho. Ny fandriany dia natao tamin'ny lamba beige. Latabatra madio miaraka amin'ny solosaina avo lenta napetraka eo amboniny. Efijery telo lehibe sy ny kitendry ary ny totozy tsy misy tariby eo afovoany. Nisy fandriana kely teo akaikin'ny latabatra sy zavamaniry iray teo amin'ny zorony. Ahantona eo amin'ny rindrina ny sary. Trano tsara tarehy izany - tsy dia misy dikany loatra ny fomba fijery. Mazava ho azy fa madio izy ary nanana tsiro tsara.

en: “I had a bunch of girls ask if I’d date them and break up with them so they can find their soulmate,” I said, amused, perusing the burger options.
st: "Ke ne ke e-na le sehlopha sa banana ba botsang hore na ke ne ke tla ba le letsatsi mme ke ba roba le bona e le hore ba ka fumana moea oa bona oa moea," ka re, ho ithabisa, ho perusing likhetho tsa burger.
yo: "Mo ni ọpọlọpọ awọn ọmọbirin beere boya Emi yoo ṣe ọjọ wọn ati yapa pẹlu wọn ki wọn le wa ẹlẹgbẹ ọkàn wọn," Mo sọ, igbadun, perusing awọn aṣayan burger.
tn: "Ke ne ke ipotsa gore a go na le batho ba bangwe ba ba neng ba le mo go yone, ke ne ke ba botsa gore a ke bone gore ba ka nna le seabe mo go bone," ke ne ka rialo, ka bua jalo, ke ne ka ba bolelela gore ba ka nna le seabe mo go bone.

en: I smiled. I had to admit, it was refreshing that he was asking about me. I found that most men I dated just liked to talk about themselves.
st: Ke ile ka tšeha. Ke ne ke tlameha ho lumela, ho khatholla hore o ile a mpotsa ka 'na. Ke fumane hore boholo ba banna bao ke neng ke ba rata feela ho bua ka bona.
yo: Mo rẹ́rìn-ín. Mo ní láti gbà, ó tuni lára pé ó ń béèrè nípa mi. Mo rí i pé ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ọkùnrin tí mo bá fẹ́ kàn fẹ́ràn láti máa sọ̀rọ̀ nípa ara wọn.
tn: Ke a bososela. Ke ne ke batla go itse gore o a nkgatholosa, o ne a mpotsa ka ga me. Ke lemogile gore bontsi jwa batho ba ke neng ke rata go bua ka bone.
ty: Ua ataata vau. Ua tia ia ' u ia fa'i, mea haumǎrû roa e te ani maira oia no nia ia ' u. Ua ite au e, te rahiraa o te mau tane ta'u i arapae, e mea au roa na ratou ia paraparau no ni'a ia ratou iho.

en: The house was vintage rustic. Colorful area rugs covered the weathered hardwood floors. In front of a stone fireplace, there was a chunky white couch with a heavy knitted throw blanket draped over the side and plaid throw pillows at each end. There were mismatched armchairs that looked lived in, a hope chest turned coffee table, and a chandelier made of driftwood over the four-person table in the kitchen. The kitchen had a large white farm sink, white cabinets with glass panes with mason jar cups and handmade bowls and plates behind them. No dishwasher, but we’d live.
st: Ntlo ena e ne e le rustic ea khale. Libaka tse mebala-bala li ile tsa koahela libaka tse thata tse thata. Ka pel'a mollo oa lejoe la mollo, ho ne ho e-na le chunky tšoeu couch le boima knitted lahlela kobo draped holim'a lehlakoreng le plaid lahlela lipekere qetellong e 'ngoe le e' ngoe. Ho ne ho e-na le li-armchairs tse fosahetseng tse neng li shebahala li phela, sefuba sa tšepo se ile sa fetola tafole ea kofi, 'me chandelier e entsoeng ka driftwood holim'a tafole ea batho ba bane ka kichineng. Kichine e ne e na le sinki e kholo ea polasi e tšoeu, likhabote tse tšoeu tse nang le li-pane tsa khalase tse nang le linoelo tsa mason jar le likotlolo tse entsoeng ka matsoho le lipoleiti tse ka morao ho tsona. Ha ho na li-dishwasher, empa re tla phela.
yo: Ilé náà jẹ́ ìlú àtijọ́. Àwọn rọ́ọ̀gì agbègbè tí ó ní àwọ̀ bo ilẹ̀ igi líle tí ojú ọjọ́ ti borí. Níwájú ilé-ìdáná òkúta, àga ìjókòó funfun ńlá kan wà pẹ̀lú aṣọ ìbora tí wọ́n hun tí wọ́n hun ní ẹ̀gbẹ́ àti ìrọ̀rí aláwọ̀ plaid ní òpin kọ̀ọ̀kan. Àwọn àga ọwọ́ tí kò bá ìbámu mu wà tí ó jọ pé ó ń gbé, àyà ìrètí yí tábìlì kọfí padà, àti iná tí wọ́n ṣe pẹ̀lú igi driftwood lórí tábìlì ènìyàn mẹ́rin ní ilé-ìdáná. Ilé ìdáná náà ní ìwẹ̀ oko funfun ńlá, àwọn àpótí funfun pẹ̀lú ìkòkò gíláàsì pẹ̀lú ife ìkòkò mason àti abọ́ ọwọ́ àti àwo lẹ́yìn wọn. Kò sí ẹ̀rọ ìfọ abọ́, ṣùgbọ́n a máa wà láàyè.
tn: 'Ntlo e ne e le ya bogologolo' - The house was vintage rustic Go na le ditlhare tse di neng di le mo go yone go ne go na le ditlhare tse di thata tse di neng di le mo mmung o o thata. Fa go ne go na le lesaka le lesweu le lesweu le le neng le na le kobo e e bokete e e neng e latlhelwa mo letlhakoreng le le kwa godimo ga mebila e e kwa godimo. Go ne go na le dibetsa tse di neng di lebega di le mo teng, sefuba sa hope se ne sa fetola tafole ya kofi, mme khampase e e dirilweng ka fa godimo ga tafole ya batho ba le bane mo boapeelong. Khitšhine e ne e na le sinki e kgolo ya polase e tshweu, diheke tse ditshweu tse di nang le digalase tsa digalase tse di nang le dikere tsa mason jar le ditshipi tse di dirilweng ka fa morago ga tsona. No dishwasher, we're gonna die
ty: E mea nehenehe roa te fare. Ua tapo'i te mau vauvau tahua peni rau i te mau tahua raau paari. I mua i te hoê vahi tahuraa auahi, te vai ra te hoê tofa uouo e te hoê tapo'i ro'i teiaha tei taamuhia i nia i te hiti e o tei taora i te mau turua i na pae e piti. Te vai ra te tahi mau parahiraa roa e au ra e, te vai ra te tahi mau parahiraa, ua taui te hoê afata taofe, e te hoê mori hinu hamanihia i te raau parai i ni'a i te amuraa maa e maha taata i roto i te fare tunuraa maa. Te vai ra i roto i te fare tutu te hoê vahi horoiraa rahi uouo, te mau afata uouo e te mau farii hi'o e te mau au'a faraoa monamona e te mau au'a hamanihia e te rima taata e te mau mereti i muri mai. Aita e matini horoi au'a, e ora râ matou.
mai: घर पुरान देहाती छल। रंगीन क्षेत्रक गलीचा खराब दृढ़ लकड़ीक फर्शकेँ झाँपि देलक। एकटा पाथरक चिमनीक सोझाँ एकटा चंकी उज्जर सोफे छल, जकर कातमे भारी बुनल फेंकबाक कम्बल लपेटल छल आ प्रत्येक छोर पर प्लेड थ्रो तकिया छल। बेमेल आर्मचेयर छल जे रहैत छल, एकटा आशा छाती कॉफी टेबल बदलि गेल छल, आ भनसाघरमे चारि व्यक्तिक टेबुल पर ड्रिफ्टवुडसँ बनल झूमर छल। भनसाघरमे एकटा पैघ उज्जर खेतक सिंक, उज्जर अलमारीक संग काँचक शीशाक संग राजमिस्त्री जारक कप आ हाथसँ बनल कटोरा आ प्लेट छल। कोनो डिशवॉशर नहि, मुदा हम जीबैत रहब।
mg: Ny trano dia vintage rustic. Nisy ruga maro loko nandrakotra ny gorodona vita amin'ny hazo mafy. Teo anoloan'ny toeram-pamoretana vato iray, nisy sezalava fotsy feno lamba fisaka vita amin'ny vy vita amin'ny vy napetaka teo amin'ny sisiny ary nanipy ondana teo amin'ny sisiny tsirairay. Nisy seza tsy nifankahazo izay toa niaina, ny vata fanantenana dia nivadika latabatra kafe, ary ny jiro iray vita tamin'ny hazo mivaingana teo ambonin'ilay latabatra misy olona efatra tao an-dakozia. Ny lakozia dia nisy toeram-pambolena fotsy lehibe, kabinetra fotsy miaraka amin'ny vilia fitaratra miaraka amin'ny kaopy mason siny sy vilia vita tanana ary takelaka ao aoriana. Tsy misy fanasana lovia, fa ho velona izahay.

en: “Tell him no. See how he reacts. Or beat him at a game. If he takes you bowling or to miniature golf or something, destroy him. You can tell a lot about a guy by how they deal with rejection and getting their asses handed to them.”
st: Mo bolelle che. Bona kamoo a arabelang kateng. kapa ho mo otla ha a ntse a bapala. Haeba a u nka bowling kapa ho e nyenyane golf kapa ntho e itseng, mo senye. U ka ithuta ho hongata ka moshemane ka hore na ba sebetsana joang le ho hana le ho fumana litonki tseo ba li filoeng. "
yo: "Sọ fún un rárá. Wo bí ó ṣe ṣe. Tàbí kí o nà án níbi eré kan. Tí ó bá mú ọ gbá bọ́ọ̀lù tàbí lọ sí gọ́ọ̀fù kékeré tàbí nkankan, pa á run. O lè sọ púpọ̀ nípa ọkùnrin kan nípa bí wọ́n ṣe ń ṣe pẹ̀lú ìkọ̀sílẹ̀ àti gbígba kẹtẹkẹtẹ wọn lé wọn lọ́wọ́."

Le fa go ntse jalo, o ka kgona go bolelela batho ba bangwe gore ba se ka ba dira dilo tse dintsi tse ba neng ba di gana le kafa ba neng ba di gana ka gone."

Mai te peu e e rave oia ia outou no te taora i te popo aore ra no te tairi i te popo aore ra no te tahi mea, a haamou ia ' na. E nehenehe ta outou e parau i te mau mea e rave rahi no ni'a i te hoê taata na roto i ta ratou huru raveraa i te pato'iraa e te horo'araa i ta ratou mau tao'a aroha ".
mai: "ओकरा नहि कहू। देखू ओ केहन प्रतिक्रिया दैत अछि। या ओकरा कोनो खेल मे हरा दियौ। जँ ओ अहाँकेँ गेंदबाजी करबा लेल लऽ जाइत अछि वा गोल्फ वा किछु लघु करबाक लेल लऽ जाइत अछि तँ ओकरा नष्ट कऽ दियौक। अहाँ कोनो लड़काक विषयमे बहुत किछु बता सकैत छी जे ओ अस्वीकृतिसँ कोना निपटैत अछि आ अपन गधा ओकरा सौंपि दैत अछि।"
mg: Tak dia Jereo ny fihetsika ataony. Na mamely azy amin'ny lalao. Raha mitondra anao amin'ny tsatokaty izy na manao golf kely na zavatra hafa, dia ravao izy. Azonao atao ny mitantara betsaka momba ny lehilahy iray amin'ny fomba hiatrehany ny fandavana sy ny fanolorana ny ampondrany ho azy ireo.

en: I was glad we did this first. She was so busy looking at the kittens, it gave me the chance to look at her without her noticing I was staring—and I was staring. Tiny freckles on her cheeks. Bronze woven into her hair. Her hazel eyes were a kaleidoscope of green with flecks of gold. They were different in person.
st: Ke ne ke thabile haholo hore ebe ke entse sena pele. O ne a le maphathaphathe, a mpha monyetla oa ho mo sheba kantle ho eena, ke ile ka hlokomela hore ke ne ke shebile ka mahlo. Li-freckles tse nyane ka marameng a hae. Bronze e lohiloeng ka moriri oa hae. Mahlo a hae a hazel e ne e le kaleidoscope ea botala bo botala bo nang le li-fleck tsa khauta. Ka bobeli li ne li fapane ka seqo.
yo: Inú mi dùn pé a kọ́kọ́ ṣe èyí. Ọwọ́ rẹ̀ dí púpọ̀ láti wo àwọn ọmọ ologbo náà, ó fún mi ní àfààní láti wò ó láì ṣe àkíyèsí pé mò ń wò ó - mo sì ń wò ó. Àwọn freckles kékeré ní ẹ̀rẹ̀kẹ́ rẹ̀. Idẹ hun sinu irun ori rẹ. Ojú hazel rẹ̀ jẹ́ kaleidoscope aláwọ̀ ewé pẹ̀lú àwọ̀ wúrà. Wọ́n yàtọ̀ fúnra wọn.

O ne a tshwenya mo moriring wa gagwê Matlho a gagwe a hazel a ne a le botala jo botala jo botala jo bo nang le gauta. Di ne di sa tshwane le tsa batho ka bongwe.
ty: Ua oaoa roa vau i te mea e, ua rave maua i te reira na mua roa. No te rahi o ta'na ohipa i te hi'oraa i te mau fanau'a mimi, ua ti'a ia'u ia hi'o ia'na ma te ite ore e, te hi'o noa ra vau ia'na—e te hi'o noa maira vau. Te vai ra te mau hu'ahu'a i nia i to ' na papari'a. Ua firihia o Bronze i roto i to ' na rouru. Ua î roa to ' na mata i te matie e te mau hu'ahu'a auro. E mea taa ê te tahi i te tahi.

en: I think if I’d known she was coming, if she’d told me her plans to switch Hawaii out for Minnesota, none of this would feel so unbelievable. But then something told me this would feel unbelievable no matter what.

en: My anxiety pitched around inside me, and I kept trying to bring it back to the fact that at least Mom was safe and I knew where she was and I was getting to see her—even if she didn’t seem that interested in seeing me at the moment.

en: He scoffed and looked over his shoulder at me. “There’s a reason we need travel nurses in this department, people quit left and right. He is craaaaanky. Super smart but he does not like anyone who doesn’t do their job, so don’t be messing anything up. He’s in a good mood today though. Maybe he won his game of golf yesterday.” He laughed at his own joke.

en: Mom stopped to gawk at me. “What?” She paused for a dramatic moment. Then she burst into sparkling laughter. “Well, I guess it’s nice I’m showing him a good time then!”

en: I never dated men with kids. Ever. It was a hard, hard rule for me. And while they weren’t technically his, for all intents and purposes they were. So, realistically our relationship would just be our fun four dates and maybe, possibly breaking an imaginary curse.

en: The parking lot was empty. It looked like the direct entrance to the water park, which probably closed the same time the mall did. Several large green waterslides snaked out of the building and looped back in. All you could hear was the whir of something electrical and the splattering of dripping water from the slides on the pavement below.

en: If I could stop using the bathroom and throwing up, then I could take the boat and go get groceries and medicine. But even as I thought it, it felt too hard. I was shaky. I sat in the water until it ran cold and then dragged myself out and managed to get into some clean clothes, but I was too out of it to brush my hair so I just left it in the towel.
st: Haeba nka emisa ho sebelisa ntloana ea ho hlapela ebe ke lahlela, joale nka nka sekepe ebe ke ea ho reka li-groceries le meriana. Leha ho le joalo, joalo ka ha ke ne ke nahana, ho ne ho le thata haholo. Ke ne ke le skay. Ke ile ka lula ka metsing ho fihlela e matha serame ebe e hulela ka ntle mme ka khona ho kena liaparo tse ling tse hloekileng, empa ke ne ke le ho eona ho hlatsoa moriri oa ka kahoo ke sa tsoa e tlohela ka thaole.
yo: Tí mo bá lè dáwọ́ lílo balùwẹ̀ dúró kí n sì jù ú sókè, nígbà náà mo lè gbé ọkọ̀ ojú omi kí n sì lọ ra àwọn ohun èlò oúnjẹ àti oògùn. Ṣùgbọ́n bí mo ṣe rò ó, ó le jù. Mo gbọ̀n. Mo jókòó sínú omi títí tí ó fi tutù lẹ́yìn náà mo wọ ara mi jáde mo sì gbìyànjú láti wọ aṣọ tó mọ́, ṣùgbọ́n mo ti jáde jù nínú rẹ̀ láti fọ irun mi nítorí náà mo ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ fi sílẹ̀ nínú aṣọ ìnura.
tn: Fa nka tlogela go dirisa ntlwana ya me ya go tlhapa, ke ne ke ka kgona go tsaya mokoro mme ka ya go reka di-grocery le dipilisi. Le fa go ntse jalo, fa ke ne ke akanya jalo, go ne go le thata. Ke ne ke le skay. Ke ne ka nna mo metsing go fitlhela e ne e le tsididi mme morago ka gogela kwa ntle mme ka kgona go tsena mo diaparong tse di phepa, fela ke ne ke le mo go yone gore ke kgone go tlhapa moriri wa me ka jalo ke ne ke sa tswa go e tlogela mo topeng.
ty: Mai te peu e e nehenehe ta ' u e faaea i te haere i roto i te fare pape e e faarue, e nehenehe ïa vau e rave i te poti no te haere e tii i te maa e te raau. Tera râ, noa'tu to'u mana'o, e mea fifi roa. Ua maere roa vau. Ua parahi noa vau i roto i te pape e tae roa'tu i te taime ua to'eto'e roa, e i muri iho, ua huti au ia'u iho i rapae e ua nehenehe ia'u ia haere i roto i te tahi mau ahu mâ, tera râ, ua rahi roa ta'u ohipa no te purumu i to'u rouru ia nehenehe ia'u ia vaiiho i te reira i roto i te tauera.
mai: जँ हम बाथरूमक उपयोग आ फेंकनाइ बन्द कऽ सकैत छी तखन हम नाव लऽ सकैत छी आ किरानाक समान आ दबाई लऽ सकैत छी। मुदा जहिना हम सोचलहुं, इ बहुत कठिन लागल। हम डगमगा रहल छलहुं। हम पानिमे ताबत धरि बैसल रही जा धरि ठंढा नहि भऽ गेल आ फेर अपना के घसीटलक आ किछु साफ कपड़ा पहिरबामे सफल रहल, मुदा हम एहिसँ एतेक बाहर छलहुँ जे अपन केश साफ नहि कऽ सकैत छलहुँ तेँ हम एकरा तौलियामे छोड़ि देलहुँ।
mg: Raha afaka mijanona tsy mampiasa ny efitra fandroana intsony aho ary manipy azy, dia afaka maka ilay sambo aho ary mandeha mividy entana sy fanafody. en: I let my eyes linger on her longer than they should. I liked the way she looked. Rumpled and sleepy like this was the morning after I’d stayed the night. I mean I had stayed the night, but not in the way I wanted to.

en: There was a Get It Out Of Your System energy hovering around us. But I couldn’t get it out of my system. A one-night stand wouldn’t make this feeling go away. It would only make me want more of what I couldn’t have, and yet I still couldn’t stop touching her. Not anymore. I couldn’t trust myself not to take anything she offered me, no matter how temporary. It felt too good. So we cuddled while we watched movies and I held her while she slept and I breathed her in and savored every second of it. Even though I knew what it would cost me the day she left.
st: Ho ne ho e-na le matla a hau a marang-rang a marang-rang a re potileng. Empa ke ne nke ke ka e tlosa tsamaisong ea ka. Bosiu bo le bong bo ke ke ba etsa hore boikutlo bona bo se ke ba fela. E ne e tla etsa hore ke batle ho feta seo ke neng ke se na sona, empa ke ntse ke sitoa ho emisa ho mo ama. Ha ho sa le jwalo. Ke ne ke sitoa ho itšepa ho nka letho leo a mphileng lona, ho sa tsotelehe hore na ke nakoana hakae. O ne a ikutloa a le motle haholo. Ha re ntse re e-na le eona, re ile ra mo bona ha re ntse re e-na le hoo, 'me ke ile ka mo bona ha a ntse a robala, 'me ra mo tsosa ka nako eo. Le hoja ke ne ke tseba hore na ke eng e tla mpha chelete ea ka letsatsi leo a ileng a tsamaea ka lona.
yo: Níbẹ̀ ni agbára Get It Out of Your System tí ó ń rábàbà yíká wa. Ṣùgbọ́n n kò lè gbé e kúrò nínú ẹ̀rọ mi. Ìdúró alẹ́ ọjọ́ kan kò ní jẹ́ kí ìmọ̀lára yìí lọ. Yóò kàn jẹ́ kí n fẹ́ ohun tí mi ò lè ní sí i, síbẹ̀ mi ò lè dáwọ́ fífọwọ́ kàn án dúró. Kò rí bẹ́ẹ̀ mọ́. Mi ò lè gbẹ́kẹ̀lé ara mi láti má gba ohunkóhun tí ó fún mi, láìka bí ó ṣe jẹ́ fún ìgbà díẹ̀ sí. Ó dára jù. Nítorí náà a dì mọ́ra nígbà tí a ń wo fíìmù mo sì mú un nígbà tí ó sùn mo sì mí sínú mo sì gbádùn gbogbo ìṣẹ́jú àáyá rẹ̀. Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé mo mọ ohun tí yóò ná mi ní ọjọ́ tí ó lọ.
tn: 'Go ne go na le maatla a gago a a re dikologileng' - There was a power of your power in around us Ke ne ke sa kgone go e tlosa mo tsamaisong ya me. A Night Night Will Not Make This Sense Go Go Go Ke ne ke tla dira gore ke batle dilo tse dintsi tse ke neng ke sa kgone go di dira, mme le fa go ntse jalo ke ne ke sa kgone go tlogela go mo ama. Ga go sa tlhole go ntse jalo. Ke ne ke sa kgone go tsaya sepe se a neng a se dira, go sa kgathalesege gore o na le lobaka lo lo kae. Too Good Gone Too Good. Ka jalo, re ne ra mo lebelela fa re ntse re robala, ke ne ka mo fitlhela a sa ntse a le kwa tlase. Le fa go ntse jalo, ke ne ke itse gore go ne go tla duelwa eng ka letsatsi le ke neng ka tshwanelwa ke go tlogela ka lone.
ty: Te vai ra hoê rave'a e ti'a ai ia outou ia haere na piha'i iho ia matou. Aita râ i nehenehe ia'u ia tatara i te reira i rapae i to'u faanahoraa. Eita te hoê ti'araa i te hoê noa pô e faaore i teie mana'o. E faatupu te reira i te hinaaro rahi i roto ia'u i te mau mea aita e ti'a ia'u ia farii, tera râ, aita i ti'a ia'u ia faaea i te tape'a ia'na. E ere faahou mai te reira. Aita ta'u e nehenehe e ti'aturi ia'u iho eiaha e rave i te hoê noa a'e mea ta'na i pûpû mai, noa'tu te huru o te taime. E mea maitai roa. No reira, ua tauahi mâua a mataitai noa ' i mâua i te mau hoho'a teata e ua tapea vau ia ' na a taoto noa ' i oia e a huti noa ' i au i to ' na aho i roto e a au roa ' i au i te mau tetoni atoa. Noa'tu e, ua ite au e, eaha te pau i ni'a ia'u i te mahana a reva ai oia.
mai: एकटा गेट इट आउट ऑफ योर सिस्टम ऊर्जा हमर चारू कात मँडरा रहल छल। मुदा हम एकरा अपन सिस्टम सं बाहर नहि निकालि सकलहुं। एक रातिक स्टैण्ड एहि भावनाकेँ दूर नहि करत। ई हमरा ओ बेसी चाहैत जे हमरा लग नहि छल, आ तइयो हम ओकरा छूनाइ बन्द नहि कऽ सकलहुँ। नइ रहल. हम अपना पर भरोसा नहि कऽ सकैत छलहुं जे ओ हमरा जे किछु देलखिन से नहि लेब, चाहे ओ कतेक अस्थायी हो। इ बहूत बढ़िया लागल। तेँ जखन हम सिनेमा देखैत रही तखन हम सभ झुकि गेलहुं आ ओ सुतैत काल हम ओकरा पकड़ि लेलहुँ आ हम ओकरा सांस लेलहुँ आ एकर प्रत्येक सेकेण्डक स्वाद लेलहुँ। यद्यपि हम जनैत छलहुं जे जाहि दिन ओ चलि गेलीह तखन हमरा कतेक खर्च होयत।
mg: Nisy ny hery Get It Out Of Your System izay nihodina manodidina anay. Saingy tsy afaka nanala izany tao amin'ny rafitra misy ahy aho. Ny fijoroana iray alina dia tsy hahatonga izany fahatsapana izany ho lasa lavitra. Mahatonga ahy haniry bebe kokoa amin'izay tsy azoko atao izany, kanefa mbola tsy afaka ny tsy hikasika azy intsony aho. Tsy izany intsony. Tsy afaka natoky ny tenako aho tsy handray na inona na inona natolony ahy, na dia vonjimaika toy inona aza. Nahatsapa ho tsara loatra izany. Noho izany dia nitehaka izahay rehefa nijery sarimihetsika ary nohazoniko izy raha mbola natory izy ary nofofoniko sy nofofoniko isaky ny segondra izany. Na dia fantatro aza hoe ho lany tamin'ny andro nialany aho.
dv: ގެޓް އިޓް އައުޓް އޮފް ޔޯ ސިސްޓަމް އެނަރޖީ އެއް އަހަރެމެންގެ ވަށައިގެން ހިނގަމުން ދިޔައެވެ. އެކަމަކު އަޅުގަނޑަށް ސިސްޓަމުން ނުކުމެވޭ ގޮތެއް ނުވި. އެއްރޭގެ ސްޓޭންޑަކުން އެ އިހުސާސް ފިލައިގެން ނުދާނެއެވެ. އެކަމުގެ ސަބަބުން އަހަރެންގެ އަތުގައި ނެތް އިތުރު އެއްޗެއް ބޭނުންވާނެ ކަމަށާއި އަދިވެސް އަހަރެންނަށް އޭނާގެ ގައިގައި އަތްލުން ހުއްޓައެއް ނުލެވުނެވެ. ދެނެއް ނުވާނެ. ކިތަންމެ ވަގުތީ ގޮތުން ނަމަވެސް އެކަމަނާ ހުށަހެޅުއްވި އެއްވެސް އެއްޗެއް ނުހިފުމަށް އަމިއްލަ ނަފްސަށް އިތުބާރު ނުކުރެވުނެވެ. ހީވީ މާ ރަނގަޅަށެވެ. އެހެންވީމާ، އަހަންނަށް ފިލްމްތައް ބަލަން ތިއްބާ އަހަންނަށް ކަޑަލް ކޮށްލެވުނެވެ. އަހަރެން ނިދާފައި އޮއްވާ އަހަރެން އޭނާގެ އަތުގައި ހިފަހައްޓައިގެން ހުރީމެވެ. އަދި އަހަރެން ނޭވާލުމަށްފަހު އޭގެ ކޮންމެ ސިކުންތެއްގެ ރަހަ ބަލައިލީމެވެ. އެކަމަނާ ނުކުމެވަޑައިގެންނެވި ދުވަހު އެކަމުގެ އަގަކީ ކޮބައިކަން އަޅުގަނޑަށް އެނގުނު ކަމުގައިވިޔަސްމެއެވެ.

dv_shuffled: ނޭވާލުމަށްފަހު އަޅުގަނޑަށް ނުކުމެވޭ ފިލައިގެން އަހަރެންގެ ކޮންމެ މާ އިތުބާރު އެއް އަދި ދެނެއް ބަލަން އެނގުނު އެކަމަކު އެއްޗެއް އަޅުގަނޑަށް އަތުގައި އަހަންނަށް އެހެންވީމާ، ނަމަވެސް އިތުރު ފިލްމްތައް ގޮތެއް ނުކުމެވަޑައިގެންނެވި ސިސްޓަމުން ނަފްސަށް ނެތް އަހަރެމެންގެ ކޮބައިކަން އެކަމަނާ އޮއްވާ އެކަމުގެ ނުވާނެ. ހުރީމެވެ. ހުށަހެޅުއްވި އިޓް ނުދާނެއެވެ. އެނަރޖީ އޭނާގެ ކޮށްލެވުނެވެ. ނިދާފައި އަތްލުން ދުވަހު ގޮތުން ރަނގަޅަށެވެ. އެކަމުގެ އެ އެއްވެސް އެއްޗެއް އަތުގައި ބޭނުންވާނެ އަހަރެންނަށް ސިސްޓަމް އޭނާގެ އެކަމަނާ ހުއްޓައެއް ނުލެވުނެވެ. ގެޓް ތިއްބާ ރަހަ ކަޑަލް އައުޓް ހީވީ އޮފް އަގަކީ ސިކުންތެއްގެ ޔޯ އަމިއްލަ ނުހިފުމަށް އަހަރެން ސަބަބުން އިހުސާސް އަހަރެން ބަލައިލީމެވެ. އެއްރޭގެ ނުކުރެވުނެވެ. އަހަރެން ކަމުގައިވިޔަސްމެއެވެ. އަދިވެސް ކިތަންމެ ދިޔައެވެ. ސްޓޭންޑަކުން ހިނގަމުން ވަގުތީ ހިފަހައްޓައިގެން އަހަންނަށް އޭގެ ނުވި. ގައިގައި ވަށައިގެން ކަމަށާއި

en: I had to stay to do it. But that wasn’t an option, because I didn’t want the rest of it. The kids and the permanency and the commitment. I couldn’t meet him where he was, and he couldn’t leave. So we just did this instead. We skirted this line, alone on a bed, attracted to each other, wanting each other but at a standoff with no end in sight.
st: Ke ne ke tlameha ho lula ke tlameha ho e etsa. Empa seo e ne e se khetho, hobane ke ne ke sa batle tse ling kaofela. bana le ho ba le mamello le boitlamo. yo: Mo ní láti dúró láti ṣe é. Ṣùgbọ́n ìyẹn kì í ṣe àṣàyàn, nítorí mi ò fẹ́ èyí tó kù. Awọn ọmọde ati permanency ati adehun naa. Mi ò lè pàdé rẹ̀ níbi tí ó wà, kò sì lè lọ. Nítorí náà a kàn ṣe èyí dípò. A ṣe ẹ̀wù ìlà yìí, lórí ibùsùn nìkan, a nífẹ̀ẹ́ ara wa, a fẹ́ ara wa ṣùgbọ́n ní ìdènà tí kò ní òpin ní ojú.
tn: Ke ne ka tshwanelwa ke go nna gore ke dire jalo. Le fa go ntse jalo, seo e ne e se ka gore ke ne ke sa batle go dira dilo dingwe tse di setseng. Bana le ba ba neng ba na le bokgoni jwa go nna le maitlamo a bone. Ke ne ke sa kgone go mmona kwa a leng teng, mme a palelwa ke go tsamaya. Re sa tswa go dira jalo go na le moo. Re ne ra utlwana mo bolaong, re ne re batlana, mme re ne re batlana, mme re ne re sa batle go bonana.
ty: Ua ti'a ia'u ia faaea no te rave i te reira. E ere râ te reira i te hoê ravea, no te mea aita vau i hinaaro i te toea o te reira. Te mau tamarii e te mau metua tupuna e te fafauraa. Aita ta'u e nehenehe e farerei ia'na i te vahi tei reira oia, e aita ta'na e nehenehe e haere. No reira, ua na reira noa matou. Ua taamu maua i teie reni, o maua ana'e i ni'a i te ro'i, ma te here te tahi i te tahi, ma te hinaaro i te tahi e te tahi, tera râ, aita e itehia te hopearaa.
mai: हमरा इ करए के लेल रहए पड़ल। मुदा ओ कोनो विकल्प नहि छल, किएकि हम बाकी नहि चाहैत छलहुँ। बच्चा आ स्थायित्व आ प्रतिबद्धता। हम हुनका सं भेंट नहि कए सकलहुं जतए ओ छलाह, आ ओ नहि जा सकलाह। त हम बस इ केलहुं। हम सभ एहि रेखाकेँ एकटा बिछौना पर असगर घुमैत छलहुँ, एक दोसरक प्रति आकर्षित छलहुँ, एक दोसरकेँ चाहैत छलहुँ मुदा एकटा गतिरोध पर जकर कोनो अंत नहि देखल गेल।
mg: Tsy maintsy nijanona aho mba hanao izany. Saingy tsy safidy izany, satria tsy tiako ny ambiny. Ny ankizy sy ny faharetana ary ny fanoloran-tena. Tsy afaka nihaona taminy tany amin'ny toerana nisy azy aho, ary tsy afaka niala izy. Noho izany dia nanao izany fotsiny izahay. Nihodidina io tsipika io izahay, irery teo amin'ny fandriana, nifanintona, nifamihina, saingy tsy nisy fiafarany teo amin'ny fahitana.
dv: އެކަން ކުރަން މަޑުކުރަން ޖެހުނެވެ. އެކަމަކު އެއީ އޮޕްޝަނެއް ނޫން، ބާކީ ބައި އަހަރެން ބޭނުން ނުވާތީ. ކުދިންނާއި ދާއިމީކަމާއި ކޮމިޓްމަންޓް. އޭނާ ހުރި ތަނާ ބައްދަލުނުކުރެވި، އެތަނުން ނުކުމެވޭ ގޮތެއް ނުވިއެވެ. އެހެންވީމާ، އޭގެ ބަދަލުގައި އަޅުގަނޑުމެން މިކަން ކުރީ. އެނދުގައި އެކަނި، އެކަކު އަނެކަކަށް ޝައުގުވެރިވެ، އެކަކު އަނެކަކަށް އެކަކު އަނެކަކަށް އެދުނު ނަމަވެސް ނިމުމެއް ނެތް ހަމަނުޖެހުންތަކެއްގައި، މި ލައިން ސްކާޓް ކުރީމެވެ.

en: I tried to imagine living here, I really did—signing a lease on an apartment. Getting a permanent position. Living in the same place for all the seasons. Making friends, growing roots. But the thoughts terrified me. Why? Why did anything with strings make me want to run?

en: I started crying again and couldn’t hold it back. I felt full of cracks all of a sudden. Deep, long, jagged cracks. And they’d always been there. I’d just learned to live with them so long I no longer noticed them. I’d hopped over them and built little bridges and taken other routes, but I never filled them. I never fixed them. I didn’t even know how.

en: “She’s throwing clothes on the lawn! The whole backyard is covered, I’m not cleaning this up!” She yelled something in Spanish. “She sleeps for days, then she’s awake for a week straight, painting and painting her stupid wall all night long with the music blasting and she’s leaving the front door open and the whole house is full of dead bugs. Now this—I am done. You come get her or I call the cops.”

en: “Who knows,” she sniffed. “He can tell me ten and it ends up being two,” she said, wiping her cheek with her sleeve. “He wants me committed, did you know that? He told me he’d pay for an inpatient program. It’s either that or I leave. He thinks I need help.”

en: If I blocked her, it would feel like clocking out of a job that I’d been at with no breaks for the last twenty years. If I did it, it would not only keep her from calling, it would keep me from knowing if she didn’t—and both things would protect my peace. And I hadn’t felt peace in a really, really long time. But I couldn’t. I couldn’t leave her in the world with no one.

en: I could see myself behind her in the mirror. My eyes were puffy. She didn’t even ask what was wrong. It didn’t even occur to her to see why I’d been crying. It didn’t occur to her that today was my birthday and she’d forgotten, again. But now that seemed perfectly natural. Of course she’d forgotten.

en: That broken and damaged part of me that she made turned on her. The part of me that could leave anyone and any place behind and never look back activated just for her. My heart shut off. All attachments I had to her, every bond she’d ever been given was pulled from the root. My defenses wrapped around me like an impenetrable protective shield, and I felt myself go eerily calm. I knew this was the last time I’d ever see her. I wouldn’t miss her. I wouldn’t grieve her. I would never look for her. This is what I was capable of.
st: Karolo ena e robehileng le e senyehileng ea 'na eo a e entseng ho eena. Ke mang ea neng a ka siea motho e mong le e mong le sebaka se ka morao mme ha ho mohla a kang a sheba ts'ebetso bakeng sa hae. Pelo ea ka e khutsitse. Tsohle tseo ke neng ke na le tsona ho eena, e mong le e mong tlamo eo a kileng a e fuoa e ne e huleloa ho tloha motso. ʻO ka hoʻokele a me ka hoʻokele ʻana i ka hoʻokele. yo: Apá kan mi tí ó bàjẹ́ tí ó sì bàjẹ́ tí ó yí padà sí i. Apá tèmi tí ó lè fi ẹnikẹ́ni sílẹ̀ àti ibi èyíkéyìí lẹ́yìn tí kò sì wo ẹ̀yìn ṣiṣẹ́ fún un nìkan. Ọkàn mi ti pa. Ua tupa'ipa'i noa to'u mafatu. Te mau taamuraa atoa ta'u i farii ia'na, te mau taamuraa atoa tei horo'ahia ia'na, ua hutihia mai ïa mai roto mai i te aa. mai: हमर ओ टूटल आ क्षतिग्रस्त हिस्सा जे ओ बनओने छलीह ओ ओकरा पर पलटि गेल। हमर ओ भाग जे ककरो आ कोनो जगह पाछू छोड़ि सकैत छल आ कहियो पाछू मुड़ि नहि देखि सकैत छल, मात्र ओकर लेल सक्रिय भऽ गेल। हमर दिल बंद भए गेल। हुनकासँ हमर सभ लगाव छल, हुनका देल गेल प्रत्येक बन्धन जड़सँ खींचल गेल छल। हमर बचाव हमरा चारू कात एकटा अभेद्य सुरक्षात्मक ढाल जकाँ लपेटल छल, आ हम महसूस कयलहुँ जे हम भयंकर शान्त भऽ गेल छी। हम जनैत छलहुं जे ई अंतिम बेर छल जखन हम हुनका देखलहुं। हम ओकरा याद नहि करब। हम ओकरा दुखी नहि करब। हम ओकरा कहियो नहि तकब। इ अछि जे हम सक्षम छलहुं।

en: I took the order and dragged myself to the chair across from her. She got up and rummaged in her bag and pulled out a sandwich, a bag of salt and vinegar chips, and a bottle of apple juice. She unwrapped the sandwich and put it in my hand, opened the chips, and twisted the cap off the drink. Then she sat there and watched me eat.

O ile a tsoha 'me a rummaged ka mokotleng oa hae mme a hula sandwich, mokotla oa li-chip tsa letsoai le asene, le botlolo ea lero la apole. 'Me o ile a kenya ka letsohong la ka, o ile a bula dita, 'me a sotha cap theoha seno. 'Me o ile a lula, 'me o ile a bona hore ke ja.

mg: Noraisiko ilay baiko ary notaritaritiko teo amin'ny seza teo anoloany. en: They needed people in their lives who will stay. People they can count on. I was the furthest thing from that to ever exist—but he deserved to hear that from me, not to be left the way I almost did. And even that just thrust me deeper into my belief that I wasn’t good for anyone. Not the way I currently was.
st: Ba ne ba hloka batho ba neng ba lula ba le teng bophelong ba bona. Batho bao u ka ba tšepang. E ne e le ntho e ntle ka ho fetesisa ho tloha eo ke neng ke e-na le eona,+ empa o lokeloa ke ho utloa seo ho 'na, eseng ho tloheloa ka tsela eo ke batlang ke e etsa. Le ha ho le joalo, ke ne ke mpa ke nahana hore ke ne ke se na thuso ho mang kapa mang. Eseng kamoo ke neng ke le kateng hona joale.

ty: Ua hinaaro ratou i te taata i roto i to ratou oraraa o te faaea mai. Te mau taata ta ratou e nehenehe e tiaturi. O vau te mea ino roa a'e i roto i te reira—tera râ, e mea ti'a ia'na ia faaroo i te reira i roto ia'u, eiaha râ ia vaiiho-noa-hia mai ta'u i mana'o. E noa'tu te reira, ua hohonu roa'tu to'u ti'aturiraa e, e ere au i te mea maitai no te hoê noa a'e taata. E ere mai te reira to'u huru i teie nei.
mai: हुनका अपन जीवन मे एहन लोक के जरूरत छल जे रहत। ओ लोक पर भरोसा कए सकैत छथि। हम ओहिसँ सबसँ दूर छलहुँ जे एखन धरि अस्तित्वमे छलहुँ - मुदा ओ हमरा सँ ई सुनबाक हकदार छलाह, ओहि तरहेँ नहि छोड़ल जाय जेना हम लगभग कयने छलहुँ। आ ओ सेहो हमरा अपन विश्वासमे गहींर धकेल देलक जे हम केकरो लेल नीक नहि छी। नहि जेना हम एखन छलहुं।
mg: Mila olona eo amin'ny fiainany izy ireo izay hijanona. Ny olona azony ianteherana. en: I never saw anything in Sarah’s Snap stories that made me think he had a girlfriend—at least nobody serious enough to bring around the kids. But he might be dating. That was a very real possibility. Someone else’s fingers tangled in his thick hair. Him laughing with his head on their pillow.
st: Ha ke e-s'o bone ntho leha e le efe ka har'a li-snap tse ileng tsa etsa hore ke nahane hore o ne a na le kharebe ea hae bonyane ha ho na motho ea tebileng ka ho lekaneng ho tlisa bana. Mohlomong o ile a kopana le eena. Ena e ne e le monyetla oa sebele haholo. Motho e mong o ne a e-na le moriri oa hae o mosesane. O ile a tsheha ka hlooho ya hae.
yo: Mi ò rí ohunkóhun rí nínú àwọn ìtàn Sarah's Snap tí ó jẹ́ kí n rò pé ó ní ọ̀rẹ́bìnrin - ó kéré tán kò sí ẹni tí ó ṣe pàtàkì tó láti mú àwọn ọmọdé wá. Ṣùgbọ́n ó lè máa fẹ́ra. Ìyẹn ṣe é ṣe gidi gan-an. Ìka ẹlòmíràn wọ irun rẹ̀ tó nípọn. Ó ń rẹ́rìn-ín pẹ̀lú orí rẹ̀ lórí ìrọ̀rí wọn.
tn: Ga ke ise ke bone sepe se se neng sa dira gore ke nne le ngwana wa mosetsana yo o neng a le mo go yone, o ne a se na ditsala tse di neng di le botlhokwa thata. Gong Gong Dating E ne e le tshono e e botlhokwa tota. Motho yo mongwe o ne a iphitlha mo moriring wa gagwe o o moleele. O ne a tshega ka tlhôgô ya gagwê
ty: Aita roa'tu vau i ite noa'e i te hoê mea i roto i te aamu o Sarah tei faatupu i te mana'o i roto ia'u e, e hoa tamahine to'na—aita hoê a'e taata i nava'i no te afa'i mai i te mau tamarii. Tera râ, te arapae ra paha oia. E nehenehe mau â te reira e tupu. Ua tahe te mau rimarima o te tahi atu taata i roto i to'na rouru meumeu. Ua ata a'e ra oia e to'na upoo i ni'a i to ratou turu'a.

en: He was in a hoodie. His hair was messy, the way I liked. I’d almost forgotten how much I missed looking at him. How handsome he was. But his gentle brown eyes weren’t happy to see me.
st: O ne a le hoodie. Moriri oa hae o ne o le moferefere, ka tsela eo ke neng ke e rata. Ke ne ke batla ke lebala hore na ke hlolohetsoe hakae ho eena. O ne a le motle hakaakang! Empa mahlo a hae a mafubelu ha aa ka a thabela ho mpona.
yo: Ó wà nínú aṣọ ooru. Irun rẹ̀ dọ̀tí, bí mo ṣe fẹ́ràn rẹ̀. Mo ti fẹ́rẹ̀ gbàgbé bí mo ṣe ṣàfẹ́rí wíwò ẹ̀. Báwo ni ó ṣe rẹwà tó. Ṣùgbọ́n ojú rẹ̀ aláwọ̀ búráwùn kò dùn láti rí mi.
tn: Gone Be A Hoodie Moriri wa gagwe o ne o le mo tlhogong, tsela e ke neng ke e rata. Ke lebetse ka moo ke mo ratang ka teng. O ne a le montle jang ne! Le fa go ntse jalo, matlho a gagwe a borokwa a ne a sa itumelela go mpona.

en: I was going to cry. And now I really did need to go. Not because I was running, but because this visit was over. I was sorry I’d come. I didn’t want to stir anything up or hurt him or remind him of something he’d already put away. He clearly didn’t want me here and there was nothing for me here either.
st: Ke ne ke tla lla. Ka 'nete ke ne ke tlameha ho tsamaea hona joale. Eseng hobane ke ne ke matha, empa hobane ketelo ena e felile. Sorry, Ke ne ke tla. Ke ne ke sa batle ho tsosa letho kapa ho mo utloisa bohloko kapa ho mo hopotsa ntho eo a neng a ka e beha. O ne a sa batle hore ke mo, 'me ha ho letho le ka ntsamaisang mona.
yo: Mo máa sunkún. Ní báyìí mo ní láti lọ. Kìí ṣe torí pé mò ń sáré, ṣùgbọ́n nítorí àbẹ̀wò yìí ti parí. Mo tọrọ àforíjì pé mo wá. Mi ò fẹ́ rú ohunkóhun sókè tàbí ṣe ìpalára fún un tàbí rán an létí nkan tí ó ti fi sílẹ̀ tẹ́lẹ̀. Ó hàn gbangba pé kò fẹ́ mi níbí kò sì sí nkankan fún mi níbí náà.

mai: हम रोबए जा रहल छलहुं। आ आब हमरा वास्तव मे जाए के जरूरत छल। एहि लेल नहि जे हम दौड़ि रहल छलहुं, बल्कि एहि लेल जे ई यात्रा खतम भऽ गेल छल। हमरा खेद छल जे हम आबि गेलहुं। हम किछु हलचल नहि करय चाहैत छलहुं या ओकरा चोट नहि पहुँचाबय चाहैत छलहुं या ओकरा कोनो एहन चीज के मोन पाड़य नहि चाहैत छलहुं जे ओ पहिनेसँ राखि देने छलाह। ओ स्पष्ट रूपसँ हमरा एतय नहि चाहैत छलाह आ हमरा लेल एतय सेहो किछु नहि छल।

en: He was staring at me through tears. He didn’t move and he didn’t say anything. But I didn’t regret telling him. I was proud of myself for coming here and telling him. The words were his and he should have them.
st: O ile a nteba ka meokho. Ha aa ka a tsamaea, 'me ha aa ka a bua letho. Empa ha kea ikoahlaea ka ho mo bolella. Ke ne ke le motlotlo ka ho tla le ho mo joetsa. 'Me o ne a tla ba le eena, 'me o lokela ho ba le tsona.
yo: Ó ń wò mí pẹ̀lú omijé. Kò rìn kò sì sọ nkankan. Ṣùgbọ́n mi ò kábàámọ̀ sísọ fún un. Inú mi dùn sí ara mi fún wíwá síbí àti sísọ fún un. Àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ náà jẹ́ tirẹ̀ ó sì yẹ kí ó ní wọn.
tn: O ne a ntjheba ka dikeledi. Ga a ka a tsamaya, mme a se ka a bua sepe. Ga ke ikwatlhaele mo go ene. Ke motlotlo go bo ke le koo, ke bo ke mmoleletse. Mafoko a gagwe e ne e le a gagwe, mme a tshwanetse go nna le one.
